Dialogue.Page: A bizarre world with a clear deliniation between hemispheres.
Signs of intelligent life are present.
This planet and its people seem quite unstable at the moment. Hypothesis: Exploring here would not yet yield a satisfying conclusion.
Hopefully the... organizers of this world might soon... enact social order?
(Okay listen the mod is kinda broken right now so you won't unlock anything here from doing it yet, okay?)
